headline: RTX (RTX) Valuation Check As Shares Trade Near Fair Value Estimate
summary: RTX stock: key figures investors are watching RTX (RTX) has been drawing attention after recent trading, with the stock last closing at US$203.50. That price sits alongside a reported US$88.6b in revenue and US$6.7b in net income. For investors tracking performance, RTX shows a 1 day return of 1.20%, about 1.10% over the past week, roughly 8.68% over the past month, and around 16.95% over the past 3 months. headline: RTX's Raytheon partners with Department of War on five landmark agreements to expand critical munition production
summary: Raytheon, an RTX (NYSE: RTX) business, entered into five landmark framework agreements with the U.S. Department of War to significantly increase production capacity and speed deliveries of Land Attack and Maritime Strike variants of Tomahawk, AMRAAM® missiles, Standard Missile-3® Block IB interceptors (SM-3 IB), Standard Missile-3® Block IIA interceptors (SM-3 IIA), and Standard Missile-6® (SM-6).
